title: Plot with Character - Katherine King
description:
Plot with Character: How to Plot and Outline a Novel with Character Arc in 40 Scenes - Katherine King

A plot outline that does more.

Plot with Character offers in-depth and specific guidance toward creating a workable plot. Learning how to plot the pivotal and connecting scenes of your story shouldn't be painful. It should be practical. This guide offers you just that. Practical. It puts theory into practice in a step-by-step plot plan designed to get you from Chapter One to The End, delivering a no-frills explanation that gets to the meat of the matter, where you really need to be. In the thickening plot. And that plot is mapped out for you in a ready-to-be-filled-in set of worksheets that allows you to start writing now. And that's what you want. Write now. Grab a pen and let's get plotting!
